string.name: pmscs
string.b: Degree:\n Master of Science in Computer Science

resources.string: The study of computer programming itself investigates various aspects of the use of programming languages and complex systems, and human-computer interaction focuses on the challenges in making computers and computations useful, usable, and universally accessible to humans.
For any kind of query or any questions please call the number below.\n01941336337 \n Or come to the office within 2 pm all along the week

Option 1: Online Application
Step1: Make a payment of Tk 1000/- as application processing fee from your/agent’s Dutch Bangla Mobile Banking Account to CSE, JU biller code 345.
 The process is as follows:
Using your/agent’s Dutch Bangla Mobile Banking Account, dial *322#
From the menu appeared, select 1 for Payment
Enter 345 as Biller ID,
Enter your mobile no. as Bill Number
Enter 1000 as Amount
Enter your/agent’s mobile banking PIN
Collect Txnid (TRANSACTION ID) from the return SMS
Go to step 2 after 24 hours.
Step2: Complete your Registration. Follow the link (After successful registration you will be provided your user name and password through email [check your spam])
Step3: Login using user name and password.
Step4: Enter your mobile number and Transaction ID(Txnid)]
Step5: Download your admit card.
Option 2: Offline Application
Prescribed application form and admission brochure can be collected from the departmental office or can be downloaded from www.juniv.edu/cse/emcs.
 Filled application form along with attested copies of all certificates/mark sheets, two passport size photographs and an amount of BDT 800/- (in cash) should be submitted to the departmental office during the office hour between 9:00 am to 4:30 pm.

Your payment is clear!

 Please Visit This Website To Print Your Admitcard
http://juniv.edu/cseju/emcs/login.php

Use your mail and pasword to login !
Stood First In ACM ICPC Bangladesh region, whre another 2 team also within 10 in 2015
Stood First In ACM ICPCE Bangladesh Region in 2014
Two Times World Finalist In ACM ICPC
